text: Many thanks Mo - I created the key & certificate using XCA... with the key being in a .pem format... my understanding is that the lightweight wrapper looks for a .key format? I've tried a number of ways to convert the format unsuccessfully. Searches seem to show something like... (openssl rsa -in privkey.pem -out private.key) I've tried this on command prompt with no success. Any advice would be appreciated.
